Package com.mygdx.pirategame.sprites

Class Coin

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
com.mygdx.pirategame.sprites.Entity
com.mygdx.pirategame.sprites.Coin
public class Coin extends Entity
Coin Creates an object for each coin Extends the entity class to define coin as an entity

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the coins state. If needed, deletes the coin if picked up.

    • onContact

      public void onContact (Entity collidingEntity)
      What happens when an entity collides with the coin. The only entity that is able to do so is the player ship
